PageInfo.Message:
<COL 78f5ff>Party play with other Arisen has been
unlocked!</COL>
There are four ways to team up with other Arisen:
1. You can become the party leader and send
invitation requests to other players.
2. You can join other parties as a guest.
3. You can use the Quick Party feature.
4. You can use the Party Recruitment Board.

<COL ffdc78>If you wish to create a party as the
leader:</COL>
Go to the <COL ffdc78>"Adventure Organizer"</COL>
at the base, or access the <COL ffdc78>"Party
Management"</COL> in the game menu.
Send a <COL ffdc78>"Party Request"</COL> to the
players you want to join through "Player Search".
You can also search for players based on job,
level, and other specific settings.

You can also invite people to your party in the
following ways:
<Talk to a player character>
[<KC TOUCH>] and invite them from the
conversation menu
<Invite from the chat log>
After expanding the chat log with [<KC UI_RT>],
go to [<KC KEY_UP>/<KC KEY_DOWN>] and invite by
selecting the speaker's name.

<COL ffdc78>If you want to join someone's
party</COL>,
you need to ask another player to send<COL
ffdc78>a "party request"</COL>.
When you receive a party request, an announcement
will appear in the center of the screen.
Follow the instructions and join the party!

<COL ffdc78>【When using Quick Party】</COL>
By using the game menu and <COL ffdc78>Quick
Party</COL>, you can easily form a party with
players who have the same objective.
Specify the quest or area you want to play and
just wait. The matching process will be done
automatically, so please make use of it.

<COL ffdc78>To use the "Party Recruitment Board",
go to</COL>
Game Menu<COL ffdc78>《Recruitment Board》</COL>and
select《Party Recruitment Board》
You can use the Entry Board function to recruit
parties by category and search for players who are
currently recruiting!

Who is the party leader?
Make sure to confirm during adventures.
<COL ffdc78>If the leader is absent, the
adventure cannot proceed.</COL>
Return to the White Dragon Temple or the base
facility with the Rift Crystal, and select a new
leader from the "Party Management".

In specific content, you can confirm the <COL
ffdc78>recommended Dragon Ability points</COL>.
Moreover, you can also search for and match
Dragon Abilities.
